comments.author: RL
comments.body: Oh Dave, how I wish I could join you. 60 degrees? Unpardonable! I'm stuck here in a conference of CTO's, supporting their projections, audio, and web streaming. Alas. I can't believe I can't go out to play today :( RL

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: GTO's? One of Pontiac's finest cars, though I always thought if they'd tuned the headers on the short block 387, they would have _really_ kicked butt. Oh well... could be worse, I guess. Could be stuck in a meeting. DU
